entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 7:04 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
